Text: Is the mission (vision) for the organization clearly articulated & communicated by the leadership?
Are you able to communicate clearly with the team members?
Are the goals & objectives for the team clear?
Are you clear how your work helps achieve teamâ€™s goals?
Do you feel safe expressing your opinions, ideas during team meetings, discussions?
Do team members display high levels of cooperation and mutual support?
Are the ideas considered on their merit rather than from whom they are coming?
Is everyone valued in the team irrespective of their background, gender, cultural differences?
Do you feel secure that you will not be punished for your mistakes, when trying your best to achieve the goals?
Do you get constructive & actionable feedbacks?
Does the team respond well to changes?
Is the team able to take decisions in time bound manner?
Do team members act according to the decisions taken?
Does the team try to consciously improve regularly & frequently?
Are learning & development opportunities available to you?
Are the learnings from even failed experiments valued?
Are the boundaries within which to experiment clear?
Does the team inspire you to try out new approaches, tools, novel solutions for the work?
Do team members get things done when they say they will?
Do team members proactively communicate regarding any delays?
Does the team take pride in the work they do?
Does the team interact with the stakeholders frequently?
Is the team's work positively impacting the stakeholders?
Does the leadership provide support when the team asks for help?
Is the team able to get help / support from other teams in the organization to get the job done?
Is the team enabled to take decisions as per the situation on its own?
Does the team have culture of celebration & recognition where successes are celebrated & recognized in meanigful ways
Does the team ensure that every member adheres to the core values?
